dcterms:creator: Ryan Cotterell
Christo Kirov
John Sylak-Glassman
Jason Eisner
Mans Hulden
dcterms:description: A dataset for the CoNLL-SIGMORPHON 2017 Shared Task on Universal Morphological Reinflection, providing training data for iniection generation in five languages: English, German, Persian, Polish, and Spanish. The training data is limited to 100 labeled examples, with and without monolingual corpora.
dcterms:title: CoNLL-SIGMORPHON 2017 Shared Task Dataset

dcterms:creator: Ryan Cotterell
Christo Kirov
John Sylak-Glassman
Jason Eisner
Mans Hulden
dcterms:description: Wikipedia dumps from March 2017 used for training neural models and creating character-level language models. The data includes word types from the provided Wikipedia corpus, used to enhance the neural network's understanding of phonotactic constraints.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia Dumps (2017)
